wo-135-4-final.instruction: Finalize the Abstraction Wall by integrating the Purity Gate into the standard workflow. Mandatory: 1) Modify scripts/checkpoint.py to execute 'python scripts/verify_purity.py' as part of the validation step, 2) Expand verify_purity.py to optionally walk through all files in modules/ to ensure no leaky imports, 3) Update PROTOCOL_ENGINEERING.md to document this automated enforcement.
wo-135-4-final.title: WO-135.4: Purity Gate v2 Enforcement
